comments.body: Update test case to address text widget visibility in 2.0.0

Accepted the initial [PR 1718|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/1718] which fixes the issue. Keeping the ticket open to see if we can resolve the visual glitch where by the keyboard animates down to its correct position.

Closing bug. Verified fix on:

SDK build: 2.0.0.v20120319003254
Titanium Studio, build: 2.0.0.201203182248
xcode: 4.2
Device: iphone 4 (5.1)

Reopening issue and adding a "regression" label, since the behavior does not occur on 2.1.2.
Tested on: 
OS: Mac OS X Lion 10.7.4
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium SDK, build: 2.1.3.v20121002110115; 2.1.3.v20120928203111
Devices: iPhone 5 (6.0.GM), iPhone 4 (5.1.1)

Note: After step 3 from description do not rotate the device to lanscape mode, keep it in portrait.

FIXED ON MASTER BY https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/3098
FIXED ON 2_1_X BY https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/3099

INTRODUCED BY FIX FOR TIMOB-11023
reintroduced by fix for timob-11023, so linking it here.
doing CR & FR against all regressing tickets.

Closing as fixed.
